Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans are 3-16 against conference opponents.
The Pelicans have a 1-18 record in games decided by 10 points or more.
The Clippers are 13-12 against Western Conference opponents.
The Clippers average 109.4 points and have outscored opponents by 2.3 points per game.
The Pelicans average 106.5 points per game, 0.6 fewer points than the 107.1 the Clippers allow.
The Clippers are shooting 46.8% from the field, 1.7% lower than the 48.5% the Pelicans' opponents have shot this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brandon Ingram is shooting 46.5% and averaging 22.2 points for the Pelicans.
James Harden is averaging 21.9 points, 6.4 rebounds, 8.1 assists and 1.5 steals for the Clippers.
Others: Brandon Ingram is out (ankle), Zion Williamson is out (hamstring), Karlo Matkovic is out (back), and Jose Alvarado is out (hamstring) for the Pelicans.
Terance Mann is out (finger), Kevin Porter Jr. is day to day (illness), Kobe Brown is day to day (back), Kawhi Leonard is out (knee), and P.J. Tucker is out (personal) for the Clippers.
